name: Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows
description: Xbox 360 hard drive is required to use this item Local Multiplayer 2-4. GAME-PLAY ALERT: This game has been fully tested to successfully play on your Xbox 360 console. Seven Sorrows is the fusion of fantasy fighting action with the strategy and fascination of user-friendly RPG elements, challenging gamers in solo play, co-op, and a thriving online community.
